question: What does the 104th Constitution Amendment Bill relate for?
option1: Abolition of Legislative Councils in certain States
option2: Introduction of dual citizenship for persons of Indian origin living outside India
option3: Providing quota to socially and educationally backward classes in private educational institutions
option4: Providing quota for religious minorities in the services under the Central Government
answer: Providing quota to socially and educationally backward classes in private educational institutions
explanation: The 104th Constitution Amendment Bill, passed almost unanimously, ostensibly to help the underprivileged, will end up effectively bringing under the control of the government bureaucracy a major portion of the private education sector.
